texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If up2date throws some horrible Python errors and rpm says “rpmdb: Lock table is out of available locker entries”, you can restore your system to normality with the following:
texts.text: If up2date throws some horrible Python errors and rpm says “rpmdb: Lock table is out of available locker entries”, you can restore your system to normality with the following:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
rpmdb: Lock table is out of available locker entries
error: db4 error(22) from db->close: Invalid argument
error: cannot open Packages index using db3 - Cannot allocate memory (12)
error: cannot open Packages database in /var/lib/rpm
texts.text:
rpmdb: Lock table is out of available locker entries
error: db4 error(22) from db->close: Invalid argument
error: cannot open Packages index using db3 - Cannot allocate memory (12)
error: cannot open Packages database in /var/lib/rpm

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Make a backup of /var/lib/rpm in case you break something:
texts.text: Make a backup of /var/lib/rpm in case you break something:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Remove the Berkeley databases that rpm uses:
texts.text: Remove the Berkeley databases that rpm uses:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Make rpm rebuild the databases from scratch (may take a short while):
texts.text: Make rpm rebuild the databases from scratch (may take a short while):

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Now, check rpm to make sure everything is okay:
texts.text: Now, check rpm to make sure everything is okay:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: When rpm accesses the Berkeley database files, it makes temporary locker entries within the tables while it searches for data. If you control-c your rpm processes often, this issue will occur much sooner because the locks are never cleared.
texts.text: When rpm accesses the Berkeley database files, it makes temporary locker entries within the tables while it searches for data. If you control-c your rpm processes often, this issue will occur much sooner because the locks are never cleared.
